Anticheat Bypass.name: Κατάργηση Anti-Cheat
Anticheat Bypass.desc: Καταργεί όλα τα anticheats. [Επίπεδα, Δημιουργός, κλπ.]

Practice Music.name: Μουσικη Εξάσκησης
Practice Music.desc: Ξεκλειδώνει Μουσική Εξάσκησης ακόμα και αν είναι κλειδωμένη.

Safe Mode.name: Λειτουργεία Ασφάλειας
Safe Mode.desc: Σταματάει να γίνεται πρόοδος σε ένα επίπεδο  .

Accurate Percentage.name: Ακριβές Ποσοστό
Accurate Percentage.desc: Αφήνει να υπάρχουν δεκαδικοί αριθμοί στο ποσοστό ενός επιπέδου. [Beyond thousandths place]

Layout Mode.name: Διαγραφή Διακόσμησης
Layout Mode.desc: Διαγράφει όλη την διακόσμηση από ένα επίπεδο .

No Transition.name: Γρήγορη Αλλαγη Σκηνών
No Transition.desc: Αλλάζει την διάρκεια όταν αλλάζει σηκηνή σε 0 δευτερόλεπτα.

Cheat Indicator.name: Δείκτης Κλεψιάς
Cheat Indicator.desc: Δείχνει ένα είκονακι για να βλέπεις πότε χρεισημοποιείς τροποποιήσεις που θεωρούνται κλέψιμο.

Speedhack.name: Αλλαγή ταχύτητας
Speedhack.desc: Αλλάζει την ταχύτητα του παιχνιδιού και της μουσικής.

FPS Bypass.name: Ξεκλείδωμα FPS
FPS Bypass.desc: Ξεκλειδώνει το FPS για να είναι μεγαλύτερο από 60.

Reset Speedhack.name: Επαναφορά Speedhack
Reset Speedhack.desc: Επαναφέρει το speedhack σε νορμάλ ταχύτητα.

No Spikes.name: Οχι Aγκάθια
No Spikes.desc: Κάνει τον παίχτη ανίκητο μόνο σε αγγάθια.

No Hitbox.name: Οχι Hitbox
No Hitbox.desc: Καταργεί ολα τα hitbox σε ένα επίπεδο.

No Solids.name: Όχι στερεά
No Solids.desc: Καταργεί τα hitbox όλων των στερεών αντικειμένων.

No Mirror Transition.name: Οχι καθρέυτης
No Mirror Transition.desc: Σταματάει την οθόνη από το να καθρευτίζεται σε ένα πόρταλ καθρεύτη.

Instant Mirror Portal.name: Άμεσoς καθρευτισμός
Instant Mirror Portal.desc: Ο καθρευτισμός σε ένα πόρταλ καθρεύτη τώρα γίνεται αμέσως.

Instant Complete.name: Άμεση ολοκλήρωση
Instant Complete.desc: Άμεση ολοκλήρωση ενός επιπέδου. (Do not enable in the Editor)

Force Platformer Mode.name: Aναγκαστικό Platformer Mode
Force Platformer Mode.desc: Αναγκάζει platformer mode όταν παίζεται ένα επίπεδο.

Text Length.name: Απειρο κείμενο
Text Length.desc: Αφήνει για άπειρο κείμενο στην εισαγωγή κειμένου.

Character Filter.name: Φίλτρο Χαρακτήρων
Character Filter.desc: Αφήνει για όλους τους χαρακτήρες κειμένου στην εισαγωγή κειμένου.

Slider Limit.name: Slider Limit
Slider Limit.desc: Lets sliders be dragged beyond the visible limit.

Free Shop Items.name: Δωρεάν αντικείμενα αγωράς
Free Shop Items.desc: Αφήνει όλα τα αντικείμενα του μαγαζιού να μπορούν να αγωραστούν για 0 mana orbs.

Backup Stars Limit.name: Backup Stars Limit
Backup Stars Limit.desc: Lets you backup data, even with less than 10 stars.

Level Edit.name: Level Edit
Level Edit.desc: Lets you edit any level, access the editor through the pause menu. (UNSTABLE)

Verify Hack.name: Verify Hack
Verify Hack.desc: Lets you upload unverified levels. Will automatically set levels to be verified.

Copy Hack.name: Copy Hack
Copy Hack.desc: Lets you copy any level, without a password.

No (C) Mark.name: No (C) Mark
No (C) Mark.desc: Removes the (C) mark when uploading copied levels. Will automatically set levels to be original.

Hide Testmode.name: Hide Testmode
Hide Testmode.desc: Hides the 'Testmode' text when playing with a startpos.

Rotation Hack.name: Rotation Hack
Rotation Hack.desc: Allows you to rotate any object. Only works locally.

Default Song Bypass.name: Default Song Bypass
Default Song Bypass.desc: Lets you use hidden default songs in the editor.

No Progress Bar.name: No Progress Bar
No Progress Bar.desc: Removes the progress bar! The precentage will still be shown.

Progress Bar Position.name: Progress Bar Position
Progress Bar Position.desc: Sets the position of the progress bar.

Hide Attempts.name: Hide Attempts
Hide Attempts.desc: Whether or not the attempt label should be shown when playing a level.

Attempt Opacity.name: Attempt Opacity
Attempt Opacity.desc: Determines how opaque the attempt label should be.

Menu Opacity.name: Menu Opacity
Menu Opacity.desc: Determines how opaque the menu should be.

Theme.name: Theme
Theme.desc: Select the UI theme for Prism Menu!

Live Theme Editing.name: Live Theme Editing
Live Theme Editing.desc: This will allow you to edit your custom theme while seeing changes on screen! (Warning: This may cause a memory leak.)

Show Tooltips.name: Show Tooltips
Show Tooltips.desc: Whether or not tooltips should be shown when hovering over mods.

Show Button.name: Show Button
Show Button.desc: Shows the button to activate the menu. It's recommended to keep this enabled for Android.

Button Position X.name: Button Position X
Button Position X.desc: The X position for the button to open the menu.

Button Position Y.name: Button Position Y
Button Position Y.desc: The Y position for the button to open the menu.

Language.name: Language
Language.desc: Sets the language for Prism Menu!

Restore Defaults.name: Restore Defaults
Restore Defaults.desc: Disables all mods and resets everything to default.

Credits.name: Credits
Credits.desc: People who have helped with the mod!

Thank you to Electrify (ES), Jouca (FR),.name: Thank you to Electrify (ES), Jouca (FR), dank_meme01, savvacorgi, МегаСвятой (RU), Gazonk (BR), huhnmitferrari (DE), and Ignis (CS) for translations!

And thank you for using the mod! I hope.name: And thank you for using the mod! I hope you enjoy using Prism Menu!

Menu Scale.name: Menu Scale
Menu Scale.desc: Decides how big the text and buttons should be. (Will require restarting the game)

Show Hidden Objects.name: Show Hidden Objects
Show Hidden Objects.desc: Shows all hidden objects. This will reset the objects primary color. This will not work on objects with the "Hide" attribute. (Useful with Layout Mode)

Transparent BG.name: Transparent BG
Transparent BG.desc: Automatically reverts colors changed in the background to be their original color.

Speedhack Audio.name: Speedhack Audio
Speedhack Audio.desc: Whether or not to also change the audio speed based on the speedhack value.

Noclip Accuracy.name: Noclip Accuracy
Noclip Accuracy.desc: Informs you how accurate your noclip run is. (Will not work without Anticheat Bypass enabled)

Show Graphic Options.name: Show Graphic Options
Show Graphic Options.desc: Shows you Geometry Dash's graphic options! Useful for Android as the option is normally not available.

No Trail.name: No Trail
No Trail.desc: Disables any trail effect from the player.

No Wave Trail.name: No Wave Trail
No Wave Trail.desc: Disables the trail behind the wave.

Solid Wave Trail.name: Solid Wave Trail
Solid Wave Trail.desc: Removes the blending of both icon colors on the wave trail.

Extra Percent Digits.name: Extra Percent Digits
Extra Percent Digits.desc: Number of extra decimal digits to be displayed with Accurate Percentage.

Uncomplete Level.name: Uncomplete Level
Uncomplete Level.desc: Resets normal and practice percentages, and allows you to decrease your star count if you completed the level!

Disable Camera Effects.name: Disable Camera Effects
Disable Camera Effects.desc: Disables any camera effects, and only focuses the camera on the player. This might break all gamemodes except Cube and Robot.

Show Hitboxes.name: Show Hitboxes
Show Hitboxes.desc: Show player, obstacle, and solid hitboxes.

Show Hitboxes on Death.name: Show Hitboxes on Death
Show Hitboxes on Death.desc: Shows hitboxes when you die, and hides them when you respawn.

TPS Bypass.name: TPS Bypass
TPS Bypass.desc: Changes the "Physics FPS" of the game to be higher or lower than the default. (240)

Macro.name: Macro
Macro.desc: Select a macro to record or play!

Record.name: Record
Record.desc: Records the gemeplay to be played back. (This will reset the current inputs if you play a level and have a macro selected.)

Macro Editor.name: Macro Editor
Macro Editor.desc: Enter the macro editor. (Will not work properly with Record enabled)

Frame Fix.name: Frame Fix
Frame Fix.desc: Records the players every movement, including position when recording and playing back a macro. Do note that this option will increase the file size of the macro while recording.

Fixed FPS.name: Fixed FPS
Fixed FPS.desc: Locks the frames to the target framerate of the macro. This may look like the "smooth fix" option is enabled if the game is lagging.

No Pulse.name: No Pulse
No Pulse.desc: Disables orbs and other related objects from pulsing on the music.

Noclip Flash.name: Noclip Flash
Noclip Flash.desc: Flashes the whole screen red instead of showing a label for your noclip accuracy.

Instant Respawn.name: Instant Respawn
Instant Respawn.desc: Removes the delay when re-attempting the level.

No Death Effect.name: No Death Effect
No Death Effect.desc: Removes explosion particles when a player dies.

No Wave Pulse.name: No Wave Pulse
No Wave Pulse.desc: Prevents the wave from pulsing to the beat of the music.

Wave Pulse Size.name: Wave Pulse Size
Wave Pulse Size.desc: How big the pulse should be for the wave.
